summary: All unique dragons, All unique shout, very violent, but dragons does not kill people.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][/center]　　　　　　　　　　　　　　[center][/center][center][youtube]wf9uEvyi9aY[/youtube]

[youtube]aY72yb15XHo[/youtube]
Mr. Gopher made a video!! Thank you very much!![/center][center][/center]
[center][/center]

[heading]Preface[/heading]
Sorry.I don't speak English. I'm relying on machine translation.
Please forgive my poor English.

Thank you very much for downloading, and if you have, endorsing, if you have not, it would make me very happy if you would!
I am unable to return comments, as my native language is not English, but I will watch them carefully for comments and bugs.

[u]1.01 Update[/u]
・Revised an item downward.
・Revised the error that there was of the report.
・Revised meshes and textures.
・Add Optional ESP file.
[color=#f9cb9c][color=#ffffff]
※About Optional ESP File※
As for this option file, an attack of NPCs can be given damage for a dragon properly.
[size=2]in other words...[/size][u]
[/u][/color][size=2][color=#ffffff][u]The dragons can not kill people, but people can kill a dragons.[/u][/color]
[/size][/color]

[color=#cc4125][u][b][color=#ea9999]About Compatibility[/color][/b][/u]

[color=#ffffff]-[color=#b6d7a8]Deadly Dragons[/color][/color]
[color=#ffffff]I know that many users want a compatible patch with Deadly Dragons.
...I'm sorry. I don't know the method to keep complete compatibility.
Competition of Leveled List is to make Bashed Patch in Wrye Bash, and coexistence is possible.
However, it is not possible for me to let Elemental Dragons fit a function of Deadly Dragons.
If somebody can make a compatibility patch, please make it. I hope for that too.[/color]

[color=#ead1dc]-Ultimate Dragons[/color]
[color=#ffffff]I installed it and tried it.[/color]
[/color][color=#cc4125][color=#ffffff]The adjustment of Health functions well, but the attack of the dragon is incoherent.[/color]
[color=#ffffff]As an example, Blizzard Dragon uses only Frost breath shout, but may use Fire breath by this MOD.[/color]
[/color]This is slightly unnatural...
Ultimate Dragons is Great MOD, but I think that I do not match Policy (elemental) of this MOD...
And,I can't do anything about it...

-[color=#c9daf8]Dragon Combat Overhaul [/color]
I Don’t know this MOD well.
But I may know only one.
[font=Arial][size=2]I can't do anything about it...[/size][/font][font=Arial][size=2]

[/size][/font]




[heading]Features[/heading]
[size=3]1) This mod adds 45 new dragons according to the leveled list (Player Level),
it is important to note these [b]replace the vanilla dragons[/b].
Each dragon has his own method of combat and elemental shout [b](not lore friendly)[/b],
[b]some[/b] [b](there are many more)[/b] are listed below:

-          [color=#dd7e6b][b]Fire[/b][/color]
-          [color=#cfe2f3][b]Frost[/b][/color]
-          [color=#b6d7a8][b]Poison[/b][/color]
-          [color=#ffe599][b]Lightning[/b][/color]
-          [color=#6fa8dc][b]Water
[/b][/color]-          [b]Wind
[/b]-          [color=#e06666][b]Blood
[/b][/color]-          [color=#fff2cc][b]Sun
[/b][/color]-          [color=#e69138][b]Acid[/b][/color] 

2) The major feature of this mod is that when the dragons attack NPCs,
it does not cause damage thus it does not ruin quests if a dragon appears during one.
This is done through the an effect which the dragon does to the NPC, mainly the ones listed below: 

-         [color=#ea9999][b]Fear
[/b][/color]-         [color=#b6d7a8][b]Paralysis[/b][/color]
-         [color=#c9daf8][b]Blow Away effect[/b][/color]

 [b]It is important to note that the ones which are not affected by these effects are:[/b] 

-          [b]The Player[/b]
-          [color=#d8d8d8][b]Bandits[/b][/color]
-          [color=#d9ead3][b]Animals[/b][/color]
-          [color=#d9d2e9][b]Creatures[/b][/color] 
[color=#ea9999][color=#ffffff]
These take the damage by the attack of the dragon.[/color][u]
[/u][color=#ffffff]NPCs except these does not take the damage.[/color][u]

[b]In addition, the people are hardly given damage to a dragon.[/b]
Exaggeratedly saying...
[b]The dragon is not killed by people, and the people are not killed by a dragon.[/b][/u][/color][b]
[/b]The damage that NPC is given to a dragon is a one-tenth of the player.
It is difficult to defeat a dragon only by power of NPCs.

3) All dragons in this mod carry items such as: 

-          [color=#a4c2f4][b]Unique Scales[/b][/color]
-          [color=#c27ba0][b]Blood Potions[/b][/color]
-          [color=#a2c4c9][b]Poisons
[/b][/color]-          [color=#f9cb9c][b]Meat[/b][/color]
-          [color=#e06666][b]Hearts[/b][/color]

There are more items but these are just a few so I won’t ruin the mod for you,
it is also important to keep certain items so they can help you fight these dragons more easily.

 4) This mod also makes changes to a few named dragons, these are:

 -         [color=#d9ead3][b]Mirmulnir[/b][/color]
-          [color=#c9daf8][b]Sahloknir
[/b][/color]-          [color=#fce5cd][b]Viinturuth[/b][/color]
-          [color=#b4a7d6][b]Vuljotnaak[/b][/color]
-          [color=#d5a6bd][b]Nahagliiv[/b][/color]
-          [color=#000000][b]Vulthuryol[/b][/color]

What’s cool about this mod (yet not unique) is that it allows you to summon these dragons once you kill them.
[b]Other named dragons that are not listed here are not affected by this change.[/b]

About Alduin,I have already released MOD.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59314/?]Violent Alduin[/url]　
[/size]

 [heading]Installation[/heading]

[size=3][color=#fff2cc][size=4][b]This mod requires:[/b][/size]
[color=#ffffff]-          [b]Skyrim
[/b]-          [b]Dawnguard[/b]
-          [b]Dragonborn[/b][/color][/color]
[/size]
[b]There is also a potential conflict with other mods that affect dragons due to this mod changing their leveled lists.[/b] 

[color=#e06666][size=3][b]**Warning:**[/b][/size][/color][b]
Once this mod is installed it is highly recommended that you start a new game.
If you do not do so the changes will not reflect well onto the game.
Any damages to your save file which are done because you installed this mod are not to be blamed on me because I have recommended you to start a new game but you did not either read this or you have ignored this warning.

[/b][heading]Known Bugs & Issues[/heading]
[size=2]
[/size][b][size=2]Currently Known Bugs:[/size]
[/b]-          NPCs die if they fall from a high point.
-          The change in weather caused by the dragon does not change once it’s over. There is a potential fix for this listed below. 
[size=2][b]
Fixes:[/b]The weather bug can be fixed either through:[/size]
-          Enter this code in the console command = FW 10E1F2
-          Reading the Scroll of Weather which is dropped by the dragon.

[heading]Item List[/heading]

[color=#f6b26b][size=3]Dragon Scales[/size][/color][size=3](Armour Slot – 60):[/size]
 -          [b]Lesser Dragon Scales[/b] - Improves armour rating by 40 points and Health is increased by 20 points.
 -          [b]Elder Dragon Scales[/b] - Improves armour rating by 60 points and Health is increased by 40 points.
 -          [b]Ancient Dragon Scales[/b] - Improves armour rating by 80 points and Health is increased by 60 points.
 -          [b]Legendary Dragon Scales[/b] - Time between Shouts is reduced by 15%.
 -          [b]Dragon Scales[/b] - Carrying Capacity is increased by 50 points.
 -          [b]Flame Dragon Scales[/b] - Resist 20% of Fire Damage.
 -          [b]Ice Dragon Scales [/b]- Resist 20% of Frost Damage.
 -          [b]Thunder Dragon Scales[/b] - Resist 20% of Shock Damage.
 -          [b]Green Dragon Scales[/b] - Resist 25% of Poison Damage.
 -          [b]Wind Dragon Scales[/b] - Movement Speed is increased by 20%.
 -          [b]Earth Dragon Scales [/b]- Reduced Falling Damage by 90%.
 -          [b]Aqua Dragon Scales[/b] – Grants the ability to walk on water.
 -          [b]Iron Dragon Scales [/b]- Ignores 50% of all Physical Damage. but you are weaker to magic and poison damage.
 -          [b]Illusion Dragon Scales [/b]- All Illusion Spells can work people which are 10 levels higher than your current level.
 -          [b]Spriggan Dragon Scales[/b] – Grants 100% resistance to Diseases and animals will neither attack nor flee from you.
 -          [b]Invisible Dragon Scales[/b] - You become 50% harder to detect.
 -          [b]Mystic Dragon Scales[/b] - Magicka is increased by 100 points, but stamina down by a 100.
 -          [b]Dragon Lich Scales[/b] - You can have three reanimated zombies at once and Conjuration Spells cost 10% less to cast. 
 -          [b]Oblivion Dragon Scales[/b] -You can have two Atronachs/Reanimated zombies at once and Conjuration spells cost 20% less to cast.
 -          [b]Red Dragon Scales [/b]- Fire Damage Resistance is increased by 33% and the Fire Breath shout deals 50% more damage.
 -          [b]Sunlight Dragon Scales [/b]- During the day, Health and Magicka and Stamina regenerates 50% faster.
 -          [b]Eclipse Dragon Scales[/b] - During the night, Health and Magicka and Stamina regenerates 50% faster.
 -          [b]Lake Dragon Stone[/b] - Can swim underwater without drowning. Stamina is increased by 100 points.
 -          [b]Serpentine Dragon Stone [/b]- Resist 50% of poison damage. Alteration spells last 30% longer.
 -          [b]Black Dragon Talon[/b] - Attack damage is increased by 25%.
 -          [b]White Dragon Talon[/b] - Destruction spells do 25% more damage.
 -          [b]Inferno Gem[/b] - Increases Fire Resistance by 25% and Fire spells do 25% more damage.
 -          [b]Ice Gem[/b] - Increases Frost Resistance by 25% and Frost spells do 25% more damage.
 -          [b]Thunder Gem[/b] - Increases Shock Resistance by 25% and Shock spells do 25% more damage.
 -          [b]Cobalt Gem[/b]  - Resist 15% of magic and Absorb 15% Magicka from enemies.
 -          [b]Elemental Gem [/b]- Fire, Frost and Shock spells do 50% more damage.
 -          [b]Melt Dragon's Core[/b] - Fire Breath shout deals 100% more damage. 

[color=#ffe599][size=3] Food[b]:[/b][/size][/color]
 -          [b]Dragon Meat[/b]　- For 12 hours, Health and Stamina regenerates 25-50% faster.
 -          [b]Grilled Dragon Meat[/b] - For 12 hours, Health and Stamina regenerates 50-100% faster.
 -          [b]Dragon Marbled Meat[/b] - For 12 hours, Health is increased by 50 points.
 -          [b]Dragon Heart[/b] - Adds one perk point. This is rare item. You can get with low probability.
[size=3]
[color=#f4cccc] Potions[/color]:[/size]
 -          [b]Dragon Blood (Low)[/b]  - Restores Health, Stamina, Magicka and Time between Shouts is reduced 10%
 -          [b]Dragon Blood (Medium)[/b] – Restores Health, Stamina, Magicka. and Time between Shouts is reduced 15%
 -          [b]Dragon Blood (High)[/b] -  Restores Health, Stamina, Magicka. and Time between Shouts is reduced 20%
 -          [b]Fire Blood [/b]- For 60 seconds, Resist 20% of Fire damage and Fire spells do 20% more damage.
 -          [b]Frost Blood[/b] - For 60 seconds, Resist 20% of Frost damage and Frost spells do 20% more damage.
 -          [b]Thunder Blood[/b] - For 60 seconds, Resist 20% of Shock damage and Shock spells do 20% more damage.
 -          [b]Dragon Rock Skin Potion[/b] - Improves the caster's Armour rating by 250 points for 60 seconds.
 -          [b]Iron Dragon's Blood[/b] - Improves the caster's Armour rating by 500 points for 60 seconds.
 -          [b]Dragon Scale Potion[/b] - Ignores 80% of all Physical damage for 30 seconds.

[size=3][b][color=#b6d7a8] Poisons[/color]:[/b][/size]
 -          [b]Dragon's poison (Green)[/b] - Causes 10 points of poison damage for 10 seconds.
 -          [b]Dragon's poison (Cyan)[/b] - Drains the target's Magicka by 50 points for 15 seconds.
 -          [b]Dragon's Venom[/b] - Causes 25 points of Poison damage for 5 seconds.
 -          [b]Dragon's Paralysis Poison[/b] - Target is paralyzed for 5 seconds, and is 100% weaker to poison damage for 5 seconds.
 -          [b]Dragon's Acid Poison[/b] - Decreases armour rating 500 points for 15 seconds.
 -          [b]Dragon's Corrosive Poison[/b] - Causes 15 points of Poison damage for 5 seconds. Decreases armour rating for 5 seconds.
 -          [b]Dragon's Oil[/b] - Target is 100% weaker to Fire damage for 20 seconds.

[size=3][b][color=#c9daf8] Scrolls[/color]:[/b][/size]
 -          [b]Scroll of Weather[/b] - Changes the weather.
 -          [b]Apocrypha Conjure Book[/b] - Summons a Creatures of Apocrypha for 2 Minutes.
 -          [b]Magic Sand[/b] - Summons a Sand Atronachs for 2 Minutes.
 -          [b]Skull Dragon's Ash[/b] - Summons a Skeleton for 2 Minutes.
